version_description:
- New route [Ratlam - Mathura] (via Kota, Sawai Madhopur, Jaipur)
- New engine [WAM4, WCAM3]
- New coaches [Duronto, Double Decker]
- Higher priority for Rajdhani and Shatabdi [under specific conditions]
- New posters in Store Listing
- Car

- Multi-Compartment sound
- Double Heading

- Passenger entrain and detrain
